threads: Abortion is health care & should be between a woman & her doctor, not left to politicians like Yvette Herrell who would ban abortion without exceptions for rape, incest or the life of the mother. #NM02
text: totally agree with you! 🌟 health care & personal choice are so important and should definitely be up to the individual & their doc 🙌 we need compassion and understanding always 💖 let’s support each other’s choices and spread positivity ✨
